lines.text:
[hearing tribal drums]
Upsidaisi what are they saying?
They're saying bum di di bum di di bum bum bum
I know that. What does it mean?
I'm flabbergasted! My gast has never been so flabbered!
There is my reputation to think of. You would need to be very circumspect.
Oh, I was! When I was a baby!

[flirtatiously]
One would feel so much safer with a strong, fearless man beside one.
Oh, I agree. But where could we find one out here?
[June is teaching Jungle Boy how to count]
One... two... three... four... five...
[grins lasciviously]
... sex.

[as Jungle Boy picks her up]
I wonder if we'll ever get to seven?
I wondered if it would be safe for me to go for a walk. I mean, would anything happen?
Darling, you could walk starkers through a Foreign Legion outpost and nothing would happen.
Fresh oysters from our lake.
Oysters? They're no good.
They are known to be highly beneficial.
Rubbish. I had a dozen last night and only five of them worked.
Enjoying the safari maam?
Immensely, though I must say I am a bit disappointed we've not seen any monkeys so far
Oh you won't, they're very busy, it's the mating season
Oh I see, would they come if I threw them some peanuts? Do you think?
Would you?
